thread.title: Kerry, Obama Call on Israeli, Palestinian Leaders to Urge Calm
thread.title_full: Kerry, Obama Call on Israeli, Palestinian Leaders to Urge Calm - WSJ

author: Felicia Schwartz
title: Kerry, Obama Call on Israeli, Palestinian Leaders to Urge Calm
text:
Secretary of State John Kerry spoke Friday with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Palestinian Authority President Mahmoud Abbas ahead of an expected trip to the region next week to try to restore calm, and President Barack Obama called on both sides to “focus on making sure that innocent people aren’t being killed.”
Mr. Obama, at a news conference in Washington on Friday, condemned the violence in Jerusalem, where a month of violence has left dozens dead. Israel has a right to maintain basic law and order, he... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
